Keywords: Hellfire Club , X-Men
Real Name: Various
Special Powers
FIVE-IN-ONE: During force construction, you may only add XMXSSOP #012 Stepford Cuckoo if there are 4 or less other XMXSSOP #012 Stepford Cuckoo's on your starting force. // When revealing forces, choose a starting line that is distinct from each other XMXSSOP #012 Stepford Cuckoo on your starting force.
WE ARE FAMILY: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, Stepford Cuckoo may count range and draw lines of fire from a friendly character named Stepford Cuckoo within range.

tidge
It seems obvious that the point cost is trying to factor in WE ARE FAMILY offering the potential for minor shenanigans that offer a limited form of 'pick-a-power' as well as 'move-and-attack', however I agree that a lower point cost (perhaps 10 points each?) would make it more appealing to play the five of them together. As for distribution, adding them to the OP set (only) was simply cruel.
